mapper.select: select * from cbsj_lmgz c where c.xmbm=#{xmbm}
select * from cbsj_sjgz c where c.xmbm=#{xmbm}
select * from cbsj_xj c where c.xmbm=#{xmbm}
select * from cbsj_yhdzx c where c.xmbm=#{xmbm}
select * from cbsj_sh c where c.xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.update: update cbsj_lmgz c set c.xmmc=#{xmmc},c.jsdw=#{jsdw},c.xzqh=#{xzqh},c.jsjsdj=#{jsjsdj}, c.jsxz=#{jsxz},c.qdzh=#{qdzh},c.zdzh=#{zdzh}, c.lj=#{lj}, c.ql=#{ql}, c.ql_ym=#{ql_ym}, c.hd=#{hd}, c.hd_m=#{hd_m}, c.mc=#{mc}, c.mc_lc=#{mc_lc}, c.jc=#{jc}, c.jc_lc=#{jc_lc}, c.dc=#{dc}, c.dc_lc=#{dc_lc}, c.sd=#{sd}, c.sd_ym=#{sd_ym}, c.dq=#{dq}, c.dq_cd=#{dq_cd}, c.dq_dk=#{dq_dk}, c.sdmc=#{sdmc}, c.sd_sfcd=#{sd_sfcd}, c.sd_lx=#{sd_lx}, c.jaf=#{jaf}, c.kgsj=#{kgsj}, c.wgsj=#{wgsj}, c.gq=#{gq}, c.sjdw=#{sjdw}, c.sjpfwh=#{sjpfwh}, c.pfsj=#{pfsj}, sfbj=#{sfbj} where c.xmbm=#{xmbm}

update cbsj_sjgz c set c.xmmc=#{xmmc},c.jsdw=#{jsdw},c.xzqh=#{xzqh},c.jsjsdj=#{jsjsdj}, c.jsxz=#{jsxz},c.qdzh=#{qdzh},c.zdzh=#{zdzh}, c.lj=#{lj}, c.ql=#{ql}, c.ql_ym=#{ql_ym}, c.hd=#{hd}, c.hd_m=#{hd_m}, c.mc=#{mc}, c.mc_lc=#{mc_lc}, c.jc=#{jc}, c.jc_lc=#{jc_lc}, c.dc=#{dc}, c.dc_lc=#{dc_lc}, c.sd=#{sd}, c.sd_ym=#{sd_ym}, c.dq=#{dq}, c.dq_cd=#{dq_cd}, c.dq_dk=#{dq_dk}, c.sdmc=#{sdmc}, c.sd_sfcd=#{sd_sfcd}, c.sd_lx=#{sd_lx}, c.jaf=#{jaf}, c.kgsj=#{kgsj}, c.wgsj=#{wgsj}, c.gq=#{gq}, c.sjdw=#{sjdw}, c.sjpfwh=#{sjpfwh}, c.pfsj=#{pfsj}, sfbj=#{sfbj} where c.xmbm=#{xmbm}

update cbsj_yhdzx c set c.xmmc=#{xmmc},c.jsdw=#{jsdw},c.xzqh=#{xzqh},c.jsjsdj=#{jsjsdj}, c.jsxz=#{jsxz},c.qdzh=#{qdzh},c.zdzh=#{zdzh}, c.lj=#{lj}, c.ql=#{ql}, c.ql_ym=#{ql_ym}, c.hd=#{hd}, c.hd_m=#{hd_m}, c.mc=#{mc}, c.mc_lc=#{mc_lc}, c.jc=#{jc}, c.jc_lc=#{jc_lc}, c.dc=#{dc}, c.dc_lc=#{dc_lc}, c.sd=#{sd}, c.sd_ym=#{sd_ym}, c.dq=#{dq}, c.dq_cd=#{dq_cd}, c.dq_dk=#{dq_dk}, c.sdmc=#{sdmc}, c.sd_sfcd=#{sd_sfcd}, c.sd_lx=#{sd_lx}, c.jaf=#{jaf}, c.kgsj=#{kgsj}, c.wgsj=#{wgsj}, c.gq=#{gq}, c.sjdw=#{sjdw}, c.sjpfwh=#{sjpfwh}, c.pfsj=#{pfsj}, sfbj=#{sfbj} where c.xmbm=#{xmbm}

update cbsj_sh c set c.xmmc=#{xmmc},c.jsdw=#{jsdw},c.xzqh=#{xzqh},c.jsjsdj=#{jsjsdj}, c.jsxz=#{jsxz},c.qdzh=#{qdzh},c.zdzh=#{zdzh}, c.lj=#{lj}, c.ql=#{ql}, c.ql_ym=#{ql_ym}, c.hd=#{hd}, c.hd_m=#{hd_m}, c.mc=#{mc}, c.mc_lc=#{mc_lc}, c.jc=#{jc}, c.jc_lc=#{jc_lc}, c.dc=#{dc}, c.dc_lc=#{dc_lc}, c.sd=#{sd}, c.sd_ym=#{sd_ym}, c.dq=#{dq}, c.dq_cd=#{dq_cd}, c.dq_dk=#{dq_dk}, c.sdmc=#{sdmc}, c.sd_sfcd=#{sd_sfcd}, c.sd_lx=#{sd_lx}, c.jaf=#{jaf}, c.kgsj=#{kgsj}, c.wgsj=#{wgsj}, c.gq=#{gq}, c.sjdw=#{sjdw}, c.sjpfwh=#{sjpfwh}, c.pfsj=#{pfsj}, sfbj=#{sfbj} where c.xmbm=#{xmbm}
update cbsj_sjgz c set c.sbzt=${sbzt},c.shzt=${shzt} where c.xmbm=#{xmbm}
update cbsj_lmgz c set c.sbzt=${sbzt},c.shzt=${shzt} where c.xmbm=#{xmbm}
update cbsj_xj c set c.sbzt=${sbzt},c.shzt=${shzt} where c.xmbm=#{xmbm}

update cbsj_sh c set c.shzt=${shzt} where c.xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.select: select * from plan_upload where parentid=#{parentid} and filetype=#{filetype}
